attributes.action: Ban Rangers Football Club from European club football due to the conduct of their fans' behaviour in Manchester during the Uefa cup final
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is disgusting the way the Rangers fans behaved during their visit to Manchester for the Uefa cup final. Police offers were treated in a disgusting manner and these fans have ruined the beutiful game with their unruly behaviour. The Rangers fans' showed the authorities absolutly no respect. All English fans are tarnished with the same brush and us as English football fans that want to attend games to enjoy the sport and not cause un-neccessary trouble do not want to be branded as 'hooligans' and 'thugs' inthe same way these Rangers fans have proven themselves to be.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
